text: Curious if there was any progress to making modules possible to set css classes on each of the elements (ie: sections, modules etc) with the old flexible columns you could control the wrapper html.
Also, wishlist item. Give us ability to limit colors in the color picker if we define it in the theme settings.
Also. The "header" module. How do you define H1,h2,h3, etc? Looks like it's only H1...
Hey Remington, just to double check, would you want to make it so that any instances of the color picker in the page editor would only show the theme colors?
We have something in the works that would make it so that the header module would allow people to set the header level in the page editor. Stay tuned!

Gotcha. Definitely something we can do some thinking about on our side. We have an update in the works to make it easier to set favorites, which weâ€™re seeing as a stepping stone to something like that
